attributes.action: Lobby the United Arab Emirates to free Raymond Bingham (aka DJ Grooverider) by way of a Kings Pardon.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Raymond Bingham (aka DJ Grooverider) has been jailed for 4 years in Dubai after being caught with a small amount of hashish (2.16 Grams).

The RADIO 1 DJ was found guilty of illegally bringing in & possessing marijuana. He was arrested at Dubai Airport on November 23 last year after traveling to Dubai to play a set. 

The DJ had previously told the court that he did not know he had the drugs on him and that he had no intention of bringing them to Dubai.

Although ignorance is never a defense, this sentence is disproportionate to the offense committed. 

Other "high profile" drug offenders in the UAE have received the Kings Pardon & have been deported. US R&B star Dallas Austin was sentenced to 4 years after being caught with a gram of cocaine & ecstasy in July 2007. He claimed the drugs had been planted, but was pardoned immediately when convicted, following intensive lobbying by US senators and pop stars.

We would like the Prime Minister to assert diplomatic pressure on the UAE for the release of Raymond Bingham.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the Foreign Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
